description: In nova/tests/api/openstack/v2/contrib/test_floating_ips.py set self.address in the test case. Nose uses TestCase.address() to retrieve the name of the test. This should not be overriding self.address
title: test_floating_ips breaks nose

comments.content: In nova/tests/api/openstack/v2/contrib/test_floating_ips.py set self.address in the test case. Nose uses TestCase.address() to retrieve the name of the test. This should not be overriding self.address
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jason-koelker

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/2825
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:

commit 8b79dae67ca2686780d3e3b5863d0578264e92a5
Author: Jason Kölker <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 4 20:16:27 2012 -0600

    Fix LP912092
    
    self.address is reserved in nose. It should not be overridden with a string.
